name: chicagotribune
text: The 133rd edition of the Sandwich Fair — one of the oldest fairs in Illinois — will not be held this year due to the coronavirus pandemic. https://t.co/j2Y8CSgbPP

name: chicagotribune
text: From furloughs and layoffs to ceasing operations, economic fallout from COVID-19 has idled hundreds of Chicago journalists, just as more people turn to local TV, radio and newspapers for information about the pandemic. https://t.co/NDsn9MWSW3
